sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Information for Dame Helenor, Issobel, and Margaret Nicolsons, Sir John Schaw of Greenock, Sir James Dunbar of Mochrum, and Mr. Thomas Nicolson younger of Balcaskie their husbands. Against Sir Thomas Nicolson of Tillcultrie.
7 p.
s.n., [Edinburgh : 1695]
Caption title. Imprint suggested by Wing. Includes a copy of the matrimonial contract between Sir Thomas Nicolson and Lady Margaret Livingston, and of the bond of provision from Sir Thomas Nicolson to his daughters. Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Includes a copy of the matrimonial contract between Sir Thomas Nicolson and Lady Margaret Livingston, and of the bond of provision from Sir Thomas Nicolson to his daughters.
